title: Payanangal Thodarudhae Lyrics Orange Mittai Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Payanangal Thodarudhae
Singer(s): Justin Prabhakaran, Naresh Iyer & Padmalatha
Lyrics: Kattalai Jaya

Payanangal thodarudhey
nedunchaalaigal neeludhey
varum vazhi marandhidum, paravai naan
iru dhuruvangal inaindhidum valaivum naan

Paalaivanathai kadakirom
solai vandha maghizkirom
edhuvumillai nirandharam
idhuvum kadanthu poividum

Arundhadhi niraimathi
adhokadhi aanadhey
kudai mazhai kadal alai
idaiveli aanadhey

Unadhu varaipadam azhuga neer thuli varayudhey
unadhu pugaipadam enadhu paer solli azhaikudhey
thiriyaal mezhugal aaradhanai vilakettrinom
eriyai vilakaai veenaagi ponomey

Vidai kodu vidai kodu mudivedu pogiren
sari vidu sari vidu vazhi vidu pogiren
unadhu kolusoli tholaivil isai ena ketkiren
unadhu edhorili thirumbum thisaigalil ketkiren
nadhiyai karaiyai theeraamaley kadhai pesinom
kadhaiyin mudivil seraamal ponomey

seo.keywords: Kattalai Jaya, Orange Mittai, Justin Prabhakaran, Naresh Iyer, Padmalatha, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
